channel.title: Doctor Who on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Doctor Who on Adam Israel

item.title: Watching Doctor Who for the first time, mostly.
item.description: [](1) Up until a year ago, I’d only seen a few episodes of Doctor Who — mostly season 1. I was interested by what I saw but I prefer to watch shows sequentially, even though the wibbly-wobbly, timey-wimey nature of the show makes viewing out of order just as enjoyable. Then Season 5 came along and I made a point of watching it from the beginning. I was hooked within the first episode.
